Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CEM10 (Pexiganan fragment, synthetic AMPs, Lys-rich, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: sequence truncation, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is 54.55% similar toPexigananK: 42%, F: 17%.Chemical modification: C-terminal amidation.Activity: active against S.aureus ATCC 25923 or ATCC 33591 MRSA (MIC 256 ug/ml), S. epidermidis  ATCC 35984 (MIC 64-128 ug/ml), and P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC 16-32 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Monteiro C, Fernandes M, Pinheiro M, Maia S, Seabra CL, Ferreira-da-Silva F, Costa F, Reis S, Gomes P, Martins MC. 2015
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial properties of membrane-active dodecapeptides derived from MSI-78.
